attributes.action: Promote long term share ownership through stamp duty changes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Long ago shares were seen as a long term investment.  Currently we see wild fluctuations in the market caused by short term profit seekers.

Companies would benefit if such speculative dealing was discouraged.  If a system was used to give financial advantages when shares are sold based on the length of time the seller had owned them it would remove some of the panic selling often seen
